BE.name: Place Animal Crossing™
BE.description: Rejoignez la Place Animal Crossing sur Wii U et découvrez une façon inédite de communiquer avec d'autres fans d'Animal Crossing dans le monde ! Dans la Place Animal Crossing, vous pouvez consulter divers billets sur la vie de la ville, d'autres messages en rapport avec Animal Crossing, des actualités liées aux évènements du calendrier ou encore des messages publiés par d'autres utilisateurs d'Animal Crossing à travers le monde. Les photos que vous avez prises en jouant à Animal Crossing: New Leaf et les motifs personnalisés QR Code® peuvent être importés à partir d’une carte SD ou organisés au sein d'albums. Vous pouvez également joindre ces images aux messages que vous publiez. En outre, les motifs QR Code publiés peuvent être lus et utilisés directement dans votre jeu Animal Crossing: New Leaf. De plus, si vous sélectionnez vos animaux préférés dans la Place Animal Crossing, vous pouvez publier des messages à propos de ces animaux en particulier, ou n'afficher que des messages les concernant. Pour voir encore plus de messages, accédez directement à la Communauté Miiverse de la série Animal Crossing à partir de la Place Animal Crossing. Dès le 14 novembre, découvre les nouvelles fonctions qui ont été ajoutées à la place Animal Crossing ! Tu peux maintenant voter pour un personnage dans le cadre du sondage du mois. (Les sondages s'arrêteront à la fin 2014, après quoi seuls les résultats seront visibles.) De plus, tu peux désormais utiliser des tampons dans tes messages manuscrits à destination de Miiverse, recenser jusqu'à 10 personnages... ou encore sauvegarder des photos publiées par d'autres utilisateurs, entre autres nouveautés ! Et si tu essayais ces nouvelles fonctions qui rendent la place Animal Crossing encore plus conviviale qu'auparavant ? Amuse-toi bien !

AU.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
AU.description: Step into Animal Crossing Plaza on Wii U and discover a new way to communicate with other Animal Crossing fans from all over the world! In Animal Crossing Plaza, you can see various posts about what’s happening in the town, other Animal Crossing-related messages, news about calendar events and messages from other Animal Crossing fans from around the world. You can import the images you took in Animal Crossing: New Leaf and design QR Code® patterns via your SD card, or organise them in albums. You can also post messages with those images. The QR Code patterns posted can be directly scanned and used in your Animal Crossing: New Leaf game, too. Additionally, by selecting your favourite animal in the Animal Crossing Plaza, you can post about those specific animals, or view posts only about them. If you want to see more posts, then you can jump directly to the Animal Crossing Series Miiverse Community from Animal Crossing Plaza. From the 14th of November Animal Crossing Plaza has some great new features! In the updated plaza, you can vote on which animal you think best fits the survey of the month. (This service will run until the end of 2014, after which the results can still be viewed.) Also, now you can use cute stamps on your handwritten messages for Miiverse, register up to 10 animals as residents, save photos other people have posted, and more! Please take a moment to try out the new features that make Animal Crossing Plaza more fun than ever!

BR.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
BR.description: Amplie a sua experiência em Animal Crossing™ através do aplicativo Animal Crossing Plaza para o console Wii U™! Crie publicações e anexe imagens dos seus melhores momentos no jogo Animal Crossing: New Leaf*, e obtenha informações sobre novos personagens e dicas de jogo. Compartilhe o Dream Address de sua cidade e convide outros usuários para visitá-la, organize as suas fotos e muito mais! *O console Nintendo 3DS e o jogo Animal Crossing: New Leaf são vendidos separadamente. Amplie a sua experiência em Animal Crossing™ no Wii U™ Carregue imagens do jogo Animal Crossing™: New Leaf para o seu Wii U™ Compartilhe suas imagens na comunidade da série Animal Crossing no Miiverse Passe um tempo com os seus personagens favoritos de Animal Crossing

FR.name: Place Animal Crossing™
FR.description: Rejoignez la Place Animal Crossing sur Wii U et découvrez une façon inédite de communiquer avec d'autres fans d'Animal Crossing dans le monde ! Dans la Place Animal Crossing, vous pouvez consulter divers billets sur la vie de la ville, d'autres messages en rapport avec Animal Crossing, des actualités liées aux évènements du calendrier ou encore des messages publiés par d'autres utilisateurs d'Animal Crossing à travers le monde. Les photos que vous avez prises en jouant à Animal Crossing: New Leaf et les motifs personnalisés QR Code® peuvent être importés à partir d’une carte SD ou organisés au sein d'albums. Vous pouvez également joindre ces images aux messages que vous publiez. En outre, les motifs QR Code publiés peuvent être lus et utilisés directement dans votre jeu Animal Crossing: New Leaf. De plus, si vous sélectionnez vos animaux préférés dans la Place Animal Crossing, vous pouvez publier des messages à propos de ces animaux en particulier, ou n'afficher que des messages les concernant. Pour voir encore plus de messages, accédez directement à la Communauté Miiverse de la série Animal Crossing à partir de la Place Animal Crossing. Dès le 14 novembre, découvre les nouvelles fonctions qui ont été ajoutées à la place Animal Crossing ! Tu peux maintenant voter pour un personnage dans le cadre du sondage du mois. (Les sondages s'arrêteront à la fin 2014, après quoi seuls les résultats seront visibles.) De plus, tu peux désormais utiliser des tampons dans tes messages manuscrits à destination de Miiverse, recenser jusqu'à 10 personnages... ou encore sauvegarder des photos publiées par d'autres utilisateurs, entre autres nouveautés ! Et si tu essayais ces nouvelles fonctions qui rendent la place Animal Crossing encore plus conviviale qu'auparavant ? Amuse-toi bien !

DE.name: Animal Crossing™-Lobby
DE.description: Tritt ein in die Animal Crossing-Lobby und entdecke eine neue Möglichkeit, dich mit anderen Animal Crossing-Fans aus aller Welt auszutauschen! In der Animal Crossing-Lobby kannst du dir verschiedene Neuigkeiten über Geschehnisse in der Stadt, sonstige Nachrichten zum Thema Animal Crossing, Neuigkeiten über Kalender-Ereignisse und Nachrichten anderer Animal Crossing-Fans aus aller Welt ansehen. Du kannst die Fotos, die du in Animal Crossing: New Leaf geknipst hast, importieren und via SD Card QR Code®-Bilder erstellen. Es besteht ebenfalls die Möglichkeit, Fotos in Alben zu sortieren. Du kannst außerdem Nachrichten mit diesen Bildern verschicken. Die verschickten QR Code-Bilder können direkt gescannt und in deinem Animal Crossing: New Leaf-Spiel verwendet werden. Zudem kannst du, indem du dein Lieblingstier in der Animal Crossing-Lobby auswählst, Nachrichten über diese speziellen Tiere verschicken oder ansehen. Wenn du mehr Nachrichten sehen möchtest, kannst du von der Animal Crossing-Lobby direkt zur Community zur Animal Crossing-Reihe springen. Ab dem 14. November hält die Animal Crossing-Lobby neue, aufregende Funktionen für dich bereit! Wähle in monatlichen Umfragen den Bewohner, der deiner Meinung nach am besten zum Thema passt! (Umfragen laufen bis 2014. Danach sind nur die Ergebnisse sichtbar.) Du kannst nun auch tolle Stempel für deine handschriftlichen Beiträge verwenden, bis zu 10 Bewohner als Nachbarn registrieren, Fotos anderer Nutzer speichern und mehr! Viel Spaß mit den neuen Funktionen der Animal Crossing-Lobby!

DK.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
DK.description: Step into Animal Crossing Plaza on Wii U and discover a new way to communicate with other Animal Crossing fans from all over the world! In Animal Crossing Plaza, you can see various posts about what’s happening in the town, other Animal Crossing-related messages, news about calendar events and messages from other Animal Crossing fans from around the world. You can import the images you took in Animal Crossing: New Leaf and design QR Code® patterns via your SD card, or organise them in albums. You can also post messages with those images. The QR Code patterns posted can be directly scanned and used in your Animal Crossing: New Leaf game, too. Additionally, by selecting your favourite animal in the Animal Crossing Plaza, you can post about those specific animals, or view posts only about them. If you want to see more posts, then you can jump directly to the Animal Crossing Series Miiverse Community from Animal Crossing Plaza. From the 14th of November Animal Crossing Plaza has some great new features! In the updated plaza, you can vote on which animal you think best fits the survey of the month. (This service will run until the end of 2014, after which the results can still be viewed.) Also, now you can use cute stamps on your handwritten messages for Miiverse, register up to 10 animals as residents, save photos other people have posted, and more! Please take a moment to try out the new features that make Animal Crossing Plaza more fun than ever!

ES.name: Plaza Animal Crossing™
ES.description: ¡Entra en Plaza Animal Crossing en Wii U y descubre una nueva forma de comunicarte con fans de Animal Crossing de todos los rincones del mundo! En Plaza Animal Crossing, podrás leer publicaciones sobre lo que ocurre en el pueblo, información relacionada con Animal Crossing, noticias sobre el calendario de eventos y mensajes de otros fans. Podrás importar las fotografías que hagas en Animal Crossing: New Leaf y los QR Code® que hayas creado a través de tu tarjeta SD y organizarlos en álbumes. Podrás utilizar estas imágenes en los mensajes que publiques. Los QR Code publicados se pueden escanear directamente y utilizarse en la partida de Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Además, si eliges a tu animal favorito en Plaza Animal Crossing, podrás escribir mensajes específicos o leer publicaciones dedicadas exclusivamente a ese animal. Si lo que quieres es ver más publicaciones, accede a la comunidad de la serie Animal Crossing en Miiverse desde Plaza Animal Crossing. ¡A partir del 14 de noviembre habrá nuevas funciones disponibles en la Plaza Animal Crossing! Ahora podrás votar por el personaje que mejor encaje en la encuesta del mes. (Solo hasta finales del 2014. A partir de entonces, solamente se mostrarán las clasificaciones.) ¡También podrás usar sellos en los mensajes manuscritos de Miiverse, marcar hasta diez personajes como residentes, guardar fotos publicadas por otros usuarios y mucho más! Te animamos a que pruebes todas estas nuevas funciones y a que sigas disfrutando de la Plaza Animal Crossing.

CA.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
CA.description: Expand and extend your Animal Crossing™ experience with the Animal Crossing Plaza application for the Wii U™ console! Post messages and attach screenshots of your Animal Crossing: New Leaf* moments and learn about new characters and in-game tips. Invite others to see your town by sharing your town’s Dream Address, organize your photos, and more! *Animal Crossing: New Leaf game and Nintendo 3DS console sold separately. Expand your Animal Crossing™ experience on Wii U™ Upload Animal Crossing™: New Leaf screenshots to your Wii U™ Share your screenshots with the Animal Crossing Miiverse Community Hang out with your favorite Animal Crossing characters

MX.name: Plaza Animal Crossing™
MX.description: ¡Expande la experiencia de Animal Crossing™ con la aplicación Plaza Animal Crossing para la consola Wii U! Publica comentarios y agrega imágenes de tus momentos en Animal Crossing: New Leaf*, conoce nuevos personajes y entérate de consejos para el juego. ¡También puedes invitar a otros a que miren tu pueblo al compartir tu número de sueño, organizar tus fotos y más! *Animal Crossing: New Leaf y la consola Nintendo 3DS se venden por separado. Expande la experiencia de Animal Crossing™ en tu consola Wii U™ Carga imágenes de Animal Crossing™: New Leaf a tu consola Wii U™ Comparte tus imágenes con la comunidad de la serie Animal Crossing en Miiverse Pasa un buen rato con tus personajes favoritos de Animal Crossing

If you want to see more posts, then you can jump directly to the Animal Crossing Series Miiverse Community from Animal Crossing Plaza. From the 14th of November Animal Crossing Plaza has some great new features! In the updated plaza, you can vote on which animal you think best fits the survey of the month. (This service will run until the end of 2014, after which the results can still be viewed.) Also, now you can use cute stamps on your handwritten messages for Miiverse, register up to 10 animals as residents, save photos other people have posted, and more! Please take a moment to try out the new features that make Animal Crossing Plaza more fun than ever!

NZ.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza

JP.name: どうぶつの森 こもれび広場
JP.description: お気に入りのどうぶつについて語り合ったり、『とびだせ どうぶつの森』で撮った思い出の写真や、自慢のマイデザインをお披露目したり…。『どうぶつの森 こもれび広場』は、Miiverseの『どうぶつの森シリーズコミュニティ』と連動して、世界中の人とどうぶつの森の話題で交流する憩いの場所です。

PT.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
PT.description: Entra em Animal Crossing Plaza na Wii U e descobre uma nova forma para comunicares com outros entusiastas de Animal Crossing de todo o mundo! Em Animal Crossing Plaza, podes visualizar várias publicações sobre o que se passa na cidade, bem como outras mensagens relacionadas com Animal Crossing, notícias sobre eventos de calendário e mensagens de outros entusiastas de Animal Crossing de todo o mundo. Podes importar as imagens que tiraste em Animal Crossing: New Leaf e desenhar padrões QR Code® através do teu Cartão SD, ou proceder à sua organização em álbuns. Podes também publicar mensagens com essas mesmas imagens. Os padrões QR Code publicados também podem ser lidos e utilizados diretamente no teu jogo Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Além disso, ao selecionares o teu animal favorito em Animal Crossing Plaza, poderás fazer publicações sobre esses mesmos animais, ou até mesmo visualizar apenas publicações sobre eles. Se quiseres visualizar mais publicações, podes avançar diretamente para a Comunidade de Notícias de Animal Crossing a partir de Animal Crossing Plaza.

US.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
US.description: Expand and extend your Animal Crossing™ experience with the Animal Crossing Plaza application for the Wii U™ console! Post messages and attach screenshots of your Animal Crossing: New Leaf* moments and learn about new characters and in-game tips. Invite others to see your town by sharing your town’s Dream Address, organize your photos, and more! *Animal Crossing: New Leaf game and Nintendo 3DS console sold separately. Expand your Animal Crossing™ experience on Wii U™ Upload Animal Crossing™: New Leaf screenshots to your Wii U™ Share your screenshots with the Animal Crossing Miiverse Community Hang out with your favorite Animal Crossing characters

NO.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza

Please take a moment to try out the new features that make Animal Crossing Plaza more fun than ever!

NL.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
NL.description: Stap in de wereld van Animal Crossing Plaza op Wii U en ontdek een nieuwe manier van communiceren met andere Animal Crossing-fans van over de hele wereld! In Animal Crossing Plaza kun je posts bekijken over wat er zich in het dorp afspeelt, andere berichten gerelateerd aan Animal Crossing, nieuws over kalenderevenementen, en berichten van andere Animal Crossing-fans van over de hele wereld. Je kunt foto's die je hebt gemaakt in Animal Crossing: New Leaf en QR Code®-afbeeldingen via je SD-kaart importeren, of ze organiseren in albums. Je kunt bij deze afbeeldingen ook berichten posten. De QR Code®-afbeeldingen die zijn gepost kunnen ingescand en gebruikt worden in jouw Animal Crossing: New Leaf-spel. Door in Animal Crossing Plaza je favoriete dier te kiezen kun je berichten over dat specifieke dier posten, of posts bekijken over dat dier. Als je meer posts wilt bekijken ga dan in Animal Crossing Plaza naar de community voor de Animal Crossing-serie. Vanaf 14 november is Animal Crossing Plaza verrijkt met nieuwe functies! In de nieuwe versie kun je stemmen op het dier dat jij het best vindt passen bij het onderzoek van de maand. (Deze dienst loopt tot en met eind 2014. Vanaf dan zijn de resultaten nog wel te raadplegen.) Je kunt nu leuke stempels toevoegen aan je handgeschreven berichten in Miiverse, maximaal tien dieren inschrijven als bewoners, foto's gepost door andere spelers opslaan en meer! We hopen dat je plezier beleeft aan de nieuwe functies die Animal Crossing Plaza leuker maken dan ooit tevoren!

IE.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
IE.description: Step into Animal Crossing Plaza on Wii U and discover a new way to communicate with other Animal Crossing fans from all over the world! In Animal Crossing Plaza, you can see various posts about what’s happening in the town, other Animal Crossing-related messages, news about calendar events and messages from other Animal Crossing fans from around the world. You can import the images you took in Animal Crossing: New Leaf and design QR Code® patterns via your SD card, or organise them in albums. You can also post messages with those images. The QR Code patterns posted can be directly scanned and used in your Animal Crossing: New Leaf game, too. Additionally, by selecting your favourite animal in the Animal Crossing Plaza, you can post about those specific animals, or view posts only about them. If you want to see more posts, then you can jump directly to the Animal Crossing Series Miiverse Community from Animal Crossing Plaza. From the 14th of November Animal Crossing Plaza has some great new features! In the updated plaza, you can vote on which animal you think best fits the survey of the month. (This service will run until the end of 2014, after which the results can still be viewed.) Also, now you can use cute stamps on your handwritten messages for Miiverse, register up to 10 animals as residents, save photos other people have posted, and more! Please take a moment to try out the new features that make Animal Crossing Plaza more fun than ever!

IT.name: Piazza Animal Crossing™
IT.description: Entra in Piazza Animal Crossing sul Wii U e scopri un nuovo modo di comunicare con i fan di Animal Crossing di tutto il mondo! In Piazza Animal Crossing, puoi visualizzare messaggi sulla città e su Animal Crossing in generale, conoscere le ultime novità sul calendario degli eventi e leggere i messaggi dei fan di Animal Crossing di tutto il mondo! Puoi importare le immagini prese da Animal Crossing: New Leaf e i design QR Code® tramite la tua scheda SD, oppure organizzarli in album. Puoi anche pubblicare messaggi con queste stesse immagini. Inoltre, puoi leggere e utilizzare i design QR Code pubblicati direttamente nella tua copia di Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Infine, selezionando il tuo animale preferito in Piazza Animal Crossing, potrai pubblicare le informazioni e visualizzare i messaggi su questo animale specifico. Se desideri leggere altri messaggi ancora, puoi accedere direttamente al gruppo della serie Animal Crossing dalla Piazza Animal Crossing. Scopri le nuove e strabilianti funzioni di Piazza Animal Crossing, a partire dal 14 novembre! Prima fra tutte, la possibilità di votare per l'animale che incarna al meglio il tema del sondaggio del mese (al termine dei sondaggi, a fine 2014, resteranno accessibili solo i risultati). Inoltre, puoi usare simpatici timbri sui post a mano libera di Miiverse, registrare fino a 10 animali come tuoi concittadini, salvare le foto pubblicate da altri utenti, e così via! Allora, cosa aspetti? Prova le nuove funzioni di Piazza Animal Crossing e divertiti come mai prima d'ora!

RU.name: Animal Crossing™ Plaza
RU.description: Добро пожаловать на Animal Crossing Plaza на Wii U! Вас ожидает встреча с фанатами игровой серии Animal Crossing со всего мира и новые возможности общения! Здесь вы получите любую интересующую вас информацию: происшествия в городе и красные дни календаря, публикации об играх и сообщения от фанатов из разных стран. А еще вы сможете импортировать фотоснимки, сделанные во время игры в Animal Crossing: New Leaf, а также коды QR Code® узоров с карты SD и сохранить их в альбомы. Публикуйте снимки в своих сообщениях и сканируйте опубликованные другими игроками коды узоров QR Code, чтобы в дальнейшем использовать их в игре. Выбрав любимое животное на Animal Crossing Plaza, вы сможете публиковать и читать сообщения о нем. Вам не терпится узнать больше обо всех играх Animal Crossing? В таком случае прямиком из Animal Crossing Plaza вы сможете попасть в Сообщество серии игр Animal Crossing в Miiverse. C 14 ноября: новые возможности Площади Animal Crossing! В обновленной версии Площади Animal Crossing вы сможете поучаствовать в ежемесячном опросе и проголосовать за полюбившегося персонажа. (Опросы будут проводиться до конца 2014 г., затем можно будет только просматривать результаты.) Кроме того, вы сможете ставить забавные печати на свои рукописные сообщения в Miiverse, регистрировать до десяти персонажей в своем городе, сохранять фотографии, опубликованные другими пользователями, и много чего еще! Опробуйте новые функции, благодаря которым Площадь Animal Crossing стала еще интереснее!
